thread.title: Chinese seed giant Shuxing to float in London
thread.title_full: Chinese seed giant Shuxing to float in London

title: Chinese seed giant Shuxing to float in London
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 6, 2015, 14:38 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 52 mins Chinese seed giant Shuxing to float in London By Oliver Haill | Sharecast – 33 minutes ago 40.71 -1.34 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Shuxing, China's largest seed planting and exporting company, has announced its intention to float on the London Stock Exchange (Other OTC: LDNXF - news ) in 2016. Shuxing Seed Industry, which is located in Sichuan province of China, said it planned to launch its initial public offer (IPO) by June 2016 through a holding company called Shuxing Plc. 
The company's president Luo Yunfei, a locally renowned agricultural products magnate, has grown the company's seed plantation land to more than 13,000 hectres. 
Luo has targeted an IPO in order to raise capital for its growth, especially to increase rice processing.
